faqList.question: Is Squad Busters heavy on mobile devices?
faqList.answer: Yes. High graphics and real-time multiplayer require strong CPU/GPU and enough RAM.

faqList.question: Can my device run Squad Busters at 60 FPS?
faqList.answer: Yes, on mid-range and high-end devices that meet recommended specifications.

faqList.question: Which devices offer the smoothest gameplay?
faqList.answer: Top Android devices like Samsung S23, Poco F6, and iPhones 12/13/14 series provide stable 60 FPS performance.
